CustomField.description: Determines the Target Date of the generated milestone as number of days following the "First Milestone Date" provided when generating Milestones from a Product Package
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the Target Date of the generated milestone. Specify as the number of days following the "First Milestone Date" provided when generating Milestones from a Product Package. Can be 0 to match the First Milestone Date.
CustomField.label: Offset Days
